title: Software
text: Automated stratigraphic correlation and age modelling

title: Software
text:
Installation
R version 4.4 (4.4.0 - 4.4.3) and Rstudio need to be installed.
Open Rstudio.
In the console, type
install.packages("StratoBayes", repos = c("https://stratobayes.github.io", getOption("repos")), type = "binary", dependencies = TRUE)

Windows
currently supports R 4.4


macOS
currently supports R 4.4 for Intel and for Apple silicon


Linux

title: Welcome to StratoBayes
text:
Software – Download and use the free StratoBayes software for non-commercial use
Website - A broader look at StratoBayes and a survey on commercial use
Workshop – Materials from the 2024 StratoBayes Workshop
